ARABIC: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِى يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلْمُجْرِمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: This is Hell which the evildoers deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: This is Hell the sinners called a lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: (It will be said): “This is the Hell that the culprits had cried lies to.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: (The guilty ones will be told), "This is hell which the sinful ones denied".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is hell, which the criminals deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: This is the Hell which the criminals denied.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: This is the hell which the guilty called a lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: This is Gehenna, that sinners cried lies to;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: This is hell which the guilty deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: This is the Hell which the guilty called a lie.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Yonder is the Hell which the culprits belied.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘This is the hell which the guilty would deny!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: This is the Hell which the Sinners deny:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: This is Hell which the Mujrimun (polytheists, criminals, sinners, etc.) denied.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: This is Gehenna (Hell) which the sinners belied,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: This is Hell that the guilty denied.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: This is Hell, which the criminals deny.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [55:43] ‘This is Hell which the guilty [were wont to] deny!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: The angels in-charge of the Fire will say to them: (This is hell which the guilty deny) the idolaters, that is during the life of the world and claimed that it does not exist.
